record.title: AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET
record.narrative:
AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET -- (Senate - July 23, 2007)

[Page: S9792]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Finance be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Monday, July 23, 2007, at 5 p.m., in room 215 of the Dirksen Senate Office Building, to consider S.J. Res. 16, approving the renewal of import restrictions contained in the Burmese Freedom and Democracy Act of 2003.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
